hadiths.text: This tradition has also been narrated by Abu Salim al-Jaishani on the authority of 'Abd Allaah b. 'Amr. He narrated this tradition at the time when he besieged the fort at the gate of Alyun. Abu Dawud said:The fort of Alyun lies at the mountain in Fustat. Abu Dawud said: The kunyah (surname) of Shaiban b. Umayyah is Abu Hudhaifah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُنْهَى عَنْهُ أَنْ يُسْتَنْجَى بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Objects With Which It Is Prohibited To Purify Oneself
